column1: Uchi////We couldn't let one of our favorite spots fizzle out
column2: so before the year ended we wanted to continue supporting Uchi and also redeemed the gift card given out to folks who ordered takeout months ago. Prior to modifications
column3: Uchi was strictly take out only for the first few months following March. Today
column4: tall makeshift plexiglass barriers constructed with wood sit in between booths. Again
column5: no bar seating. The entire bar is plexied to the teeth
